code: import{api}from"../apiClient";export var getAccount=function getAccount(){return api.get("/account");};export var updateAccount=function updateAccount(body){return api.put("/account",body,{headers:{"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"}});};export var getFriends=function getFriends(){return api.get("/account/me/friends");};export var getPendingRequests=function getPendingRequests(){return api.get("/account/me/pending");};export var sendFriendRequest=function sendFriendRequest(id){return api.post("/account/".concat(id,"/friend"));};export var removeFriend=function removeFriend(id){return api.delete("/account/".concat(id,"/friend"));};export var acceptFriendRequest=function acceptFriendRequest(id){return api.post("/account/".concat(id,"/friend/accept"));};export var declineFriendRequest=function declineFriendRequest(id){return api.post("/account/".concat(id,"/friend/cancel"));};
